0.1.2.title: Layers & Lighting v1
0.1.2.description: Implemented ambient lighting, as well as separating maps into foreground and background layers.
changes: Created background layer for floor tile data
Created lighting layer for ambient lights
Map editor now allows switching between layers
Implemented two light sources: point lights and single-tile lights
Ambient lighting is now rendered onto a separate canvas for more performant blurs

0.1.1.title: Implement Version History
0.1.1.description: Added the ability to view current and past versions and any changes they implemented
changes: Created version-changes.json to contain information for all released versions
Reorganized modal structure to allow the creation of multiple pop-up dialogs
Created front-end for viewing version history and most recent changes
Game pauses when a modal is open

0.1.0.title: Basic Engine
0.1.0.description: The initial foundation on which the game will be built. Implements a map editor and a basic raycasting engine.
